title: We Have to Keep Going!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Huff... Huff......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Great job. Aqours members sure have a lot of stamina. You even managed to dash up these stairs.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>W-well, of course... Huff...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>...You’re out of breath, huh? Are you alright? Want some water?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I’m fine! As the fallen angel Yohane, I can transform the power seeping from the earth into dark magic and imbue it upon myself...... Cough!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>That’s what happens when you talk too much when you’re out of breath...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ugh~! These stair dashes are so tough! What’s with the angle of these stairs?! I can’t believe we have to dash up those!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You’re right...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh? Eli, do you find it unbelievable too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Well, it doesn’t seem like a normal staircase to dash up... that’s for sure.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Even you think so, huh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, what do you take me for? Of course, I think it’s tough too. But I feel that the more we do it, the stronger we’ll become. That’s why we have to keep going.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>...I get what you mean.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Here, drink some water. Once we rest a bit, we’ll do one last dash.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ughhh~! Fine, alright!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
